attributes.action: take a free look at freebies ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am amazed that large public limited companies like TESCO don't have their consumer policies better regulated. I am sick to death of freebies of this and that just for a minute of your time - complete this simple survey - give your personal details and WHAM ! an invoice arrives in the post or worst still, an amount is deducted from my account. All the time I thought I was helping them ! Does anyone else have this problem ?

Given the recent attention that has been paid to the lack of confidentiality and difficulties policing databases, please can the UK govt include in their new agenda : "consumer Lifestyles" which though they may have the TESCO logo -  I am not wholely convinced of their authenticity. Under consumer law, please legislate so that companies who say they will do this, or give you that actually do - and please give better advice on the rights aspects of contractual agreements in relation to the internet.

Thank you.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
